OOC: Sandy, Blackarachnia is probably one of the foremost Ninjas on
the Predacon side at the moment, and it was declared that her stealth
was on at full power. Nightshift should not be able to casually detect
her nor keep an eye on her.



I don't mind if Nightshift maybe have a gut feeling that something is
wrong and starts searching, or maybe there is a passing scent that he
cannot quite understand and he starts looking. It gives Nightshift and
Blackarachnia a chance to play cat and mouse (or should I say cat and
spider?)

But he should not just automatically just be walking around and see
her. Not with a person of her skills.

Please rewrite this post

Thanks
- Preston

On 7/26/12, Sandra Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> Nightshift's norm was to always have a good skulk around the Ark's closest
> parameter.  And in doing so, he catches Black Arachnia's signature.  He
> sniffs the air and quietly stalks in her direction.  He keeps an eye on her
> from the distance, and opens a com link to Lord Elder.
>
> " Nightshift ta Lord Elder, hope you're in the mood ta take down a spider.
> Black Arachnia's head'n for the Ark, be on the lookout, over.  I'll keep my
> eyes on her and tell ya what's go'n down.  Nightshift out. "
>
> The large black cat pads along quietly, hoping to not be seen, heard or
> detected.
>
> Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital
> media.
>
> I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!
>
> Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this
> address and we will talk.
>
> On Jul 26, 2012, at 9:29 PM, "adamsafran" <adamsafran@...> wrote:
>
>>
>> > As BLACKARACHNIA sneaks stealthily towards the ARK she can see TUCSON
>> > hovering over head over the MAXIMALS and PREDACONS around the cave.
>> >
>> > Ahead of her she can see the ARK as well as some of the MAXIMALS
>> > moving around, presumably on guard duty" WOLFGANG and RAMULUS are
>> > standing outside, looking around casually. They do not look to be
>> > expecting trouble so have gotten somewhat lax.
>> >
>> > Behind them is the ARK and just inside the opening of the ARK is a
>> > smaller ship, one designed to carry several mechs. Occasionally
>> > several individuals go to and from it from inside the ARK as if
>> > packing it with things. LEO PRIME can be seen directing matters.
>> >
>>
>> Going along then, stealthily along the area, BLACKARACHNIA ponders. She
>> doesn't want to risk a firefight yet with the MAXIMALS, but she has to
>> bypass thier patrols.. So how to best go about that?
>>
>> She settles back to watch, waiting for the pair to be 'relieved', figuring
>> that at the moment the two are watching the next group coming out on guard
>> duty, she can sneak past both distracted groups, and head on in to her
>> prize..
>>
>> The ARK.
>>
>>
>
